name: Pumpkin Solitaire
description:
This is a new and unique solitaire game with the MmpApps no-nonscense card game interface.

Totally free!! No in-app purchases.

Try to move all cards onto the foundation. Columns are built down in-suit. However, cards do NOT have to be ordered to be movable.

RELAXED MODE - Empty columns can be filled with any card.

STRICT MODE - Empty columns can only be filled with Kings.
